X.iv.3.B.4.a
.
Entitlement to Benefits Based on Subsequent Service
Forfeiture of benefits based on one period of service
does not
affect entitlement to benefits based on a period of service beginning
after
the offense causing the forfeiture.
Important
:  Process a claim of this type based on the nonforfeiture period of service
only
.
Reference
:  For information on forfeiture of benefits based on one period of service, see
38 CFR 3.900(a)
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B  - Forfeiture of Benefits
